articles.title: Verifying or approving a domain for your enterprise
articles.subtitle: You can verify your ownership of domains with GitHub to confirm the identity of organizations owned by your enterprise account. You can also approve domains where organization members can receive email notifications.

articles.title: Viewing the audit logs for organizations in your enterprise
articles.subtitle: Enterprise owners can view aggregated actions from all of the organizations owned by an enterprise account in its audit log.

articles.title: Managing global webhooks
articles.subtitle: You can configure global webhooks to notify external web servers when events occur within your enterprise.

articles.title: About identity and access management for your enterprise
articles.subtitle: You can use SAML single sign-on (SSO) and System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) to centrally manage access to organizations owned by your enterprise on GitHub.com.

options.title: Guides
options.subtitle: Learn how to increase developer productivity and code quality with GitHub Enterprise Cloud.

options.title: What's new
options.subtitle: Discover the latest GitHub Enterprise updates on our blog
